title: “Net Plot Area”, for the purpose of the said Regulations, shall mean the balance area derived after deduction of area earmarked for reservations, D
clause_text: “Net Plot Area”, for the purpose of the said Regulations, shall mean the balance area derived after deduction of area earmarked for reservations, D.P. Roads, Road Widening under Development Plan of the concerned Planning Authority.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
